page.title: 05HOUSING IN KNIGHTON.
page.content: There is a wide variety of good quality housing.Included are new four bedroom detatched houses for Â£80 000,Victorian and Edwardian terraces,pre-war semi-detatched houses,post-war semis built for the occupation of prison officers and new flats. The outstanding feature is the residences built by architects for industrialists in the 19th century. "Inglewood" 32, Ratcliffe Road,is a grade ll listed building. It was designed by Ernest Gimson in 1892 it is an Arts and Crafts design of a two-storey house in red brick with a steeply pitched slate roof.
